abilities.description: (PASSIVE)CELL DIVISIONEach time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.
abilities.name: CELL DIVISIONE

abilities.description: (Q)STRETCHING STRIKESZac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
abilities.name: STRETCHING STRIKESZ

abilities.description: (W)UNSTABLE MATTERZac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.
abilities.name: UNSTABLE MATTERZ

abilities.description: (E)ELASTIC SLINGSHOTZac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
abilities.name: ELASTIC SLINGSHOTZ

abilities.description: (R)LET'S BOUNCE!Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.
abilities.name: LET
